0: while true; do ping localhost; sleep 60; done

cp -RL /tmp/automatisch/automatisch /mnt/ &&
cp -R /automatisch/node_modules /mnt/automatisch/ &&
cp /mnt/automatisch/docker/entrypoint.sh /mnt/automatisch/ &&
rm -rf /tmp/automatisch &&
sed -i '/set -e/a cd packages\/web && yarn build' /mnt/automatisch/entrypoint.sh &&
chown -R 1000:3000 /mnt/automatisch

cd /opt/cloudbeaver \
&& cp -R conf drivers run-server.sh samples server web /cb/ \
&& chown 1000:1000 -R /cb/* \
&& ls -lah /cb/

until [ -f /snapshots/kopia.repository.f ]; do
    printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "Waiting for the Kopia repo to become ready ..."
    sleep 1
done

#!/bin/bash
DELTA_CORE=2.4.0
DELTA_VERSION=3.0.0
SCALA_VERSION=2.13

echo 'downloading delta lake files'
apt install -y wget
wget https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/io/delta/delta-core_$SCALA_VERSION/$DELTA_CORE/delta-core_$SCALA_VERSION-$DELTA_CORE.jar -P /opt/spark/jars
wget https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/io/delta/delta-storage/$DELTA_VERSION/delta-storage-$DELTA_VERSION.jar -P $SPARK_DIR/jars/

echo 'download complete'
exit 0
